otherNames: The Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Mugen Train Arc TV, 鬼滅の刃 無限列車編
synopsis:
TV version of Kimetsu no Yaiba Movie: Mugen Ressha-hen.

The series includes an all-new episode 1 featuring the day leading up to the events in the movie, plus re-edited 6 episodes featuring new scenes and music, for a total of 7 episodes.
